main.name: Omar Hassan Abdi
main.description: I am a computer science student at Queen Mary University of London. I love exploring new technologies and often amazed by the progress we as a human species have mad so far in the recent years.
main.bio: I am an gamer at heart, with knack for coding. Once i finish my degree, i wish to take time travelling while doing remote work. During my studies i wish to work as a junior react developer as i have completed courses on react , react native.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions or wish to speak to me please feel free to leave your details below and i will be sure to reply.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I am currently pursuing a undergraduate bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I have taken modules such as OOP, Procedural programming, Algorithms and Data Structures and have better understanding of these subjects and will be able to implement them within my future work. I am also apart of numerous clubs.

I began my computer science journey in college which gave me a strong advantage when i began university. Over the two years i made many projects and learnt langauges such as Java, Python, PHP, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

work.title: Student Tutor
work.description: Working as a tutor towards young children aged 5-14 uears old, teaching them programming languages such as Scratch, JavaScript and Python

work.title: Night Shift Retail Assistant
work.description: I have been balancing work and my studies since college and i am impressed with maintaing strong grades in college to enter a russell group university and achieving a first in my first year while working nightshifts and going to lectures right after working a shift. At work i make sure that the customer has a pleasant experience in store through visual merchandising and stock replenishment as this will lead to a higher customer satisfaction.

work.title: IT technican intern
work.description: Managed calendars, office equipment, services and supplies. Updated and managed the customer database and mailing lists

projects.title: Portfolio/Blog
projects.category: Made using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL. This project includes my personal portfolio and a blog feature which requires you to log in to use.

testimonials.text: I would prersonally recommend Omar as a hardworking and dedicated person as he is the type to work towards getting things done without making excuses and achieving the peak while maintaining a balance between his work and social life
